title: One for all against team Lux.
body:
Watching your teammate die to one laser while another snipes you.

http://i.imgur.com/X4n81Zc.gif"

replies.body:
Dude, that's...Brutal. At first I thought that was like old Gundam, but then I realized I didn't recognize it. Yikes, I can already tell that's one of those super-depressing anime.

But I did play one-for-all against Lux, and I'll tell you this, we were all Garens. And every single person in the game was skinned, and with quite the variety, from both Steel Legions, to Sorceress and Star Guardian and Imperial, and also Sanguine and Dreadknight and Commando. It was like a showcase.

One Lux we ganked as a five-man group said, "ew, I got Garen in my hair and all over my face." and all of us are going lol that means two things as we do the Monkey in unison.

They also seemed to save their ults to use all at once. Many of us were caught in the crossfire between the lanes. It was both hilarious and a little distressing, because I didn't realize until now how much easier to dodge Star Guardian Lux's version of her ult is, especially compared to Steel Legion, which is almost invisible by comparison.

Maybe a little off-topic, but the more I think about it...That doesn't even seem fair, how much more visible Star Guardian is compared to all the others. If you're hitting someone long-range, they can easily spot that, far easier than any other skin.
I haven't bought Star Guardian for just that reason. Too detrimental to gameplay.

> [{quoted}](name=SelflessTeammate,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bFXPxEm0,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-10-18T03:31:23.297+0000)
>
> Dude, that's...Brutal. At first I thought that was like old Gundam, but then I realized I didn't recognize it. Yikes, I can already tell that's one of those super-depressing anime.

I have looked around, seems to be from a really old series called "Space Runaway Ideon" or "Densetsu Kyojin Ideon", from the 80s.

If it helps, it's made by the same guy who made gundam. It's one of his older works and pretty much, that series kinda served as the prequel to the gundam series. Apparently, from the videos I seen so far, EVERYONE dies. No one is left alive.

I still use my Star Guardian! Just like I refuse to use Nidalee's Headhunter skin. I'd rather have my abilities be more visible than them being either invisible or making the ability much smaller than the actual hitbox... like Headhunter Nidalee's spears... Those are both invisible, due to the aura being lost somehow in the fog of war, and being soooooooooo much thinner than a normal spear.

Played One for All Against Lux.

I won.
i played against an azir one for all... with poppy. and we won
Kappa
played as lux vs ezreal...lux lost ='(
